comments.body: I'm sure there's a test missing here somewhere. :)

Is there a simple abac file that could exist in this directory as a fixture or example for easier comprehension?  I.e. something that looks real that the abac_test.go can call?  Then we have something to point users to.

I just added a full-file example to docs/authorization.md.
Does that work?

On Wed, Nov 5, 2014 at 2:35 PM, Clayton Coleman notifications@github.com
wrote:

> In pkg/auth/authorizer/abac/abac_test.go:
> 
> > @@ -0,0 +1,140 @@
> > +/*
> 
> Is there a simple abac file that could exist in this directory as a
> fixture or example for easier comprehension? I.e. something that looks real
> that the abac_test.go can call? Then we have something to point users to.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/2184/files#r19912323
> .
Ok, I added a standalone example file, referenced it from the docs, and added a test to make sure it works.
